manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Eyes Rimmel London Magnif'eyes Eye Shadow Our new ultra-blendable formula comes in a range of finishes from mattes, shimmers to high glitter. Silky smooth finish and high impact color for all day wear.

EYES Eye Shadow Rimmel Wonder'Cloud Eyeshadow is an all-day wear soft eyeshadow. Whipped texture blends like a dream with fingertips, for buildable color you can control. Ultra soft tapered applicator for quick and mess-free application. Built in primer allows for all-day wear and zero creasing. Eye brow Tint Naturally full brows, for days. Wonder'Last Brow is a semi-permanent brow tint that lasts up to 2 days! The 0.1mm tip allows you to draw hair-like strokes, instantly filling gaps and shaping the brows. Formulated with natural-toned pigments, designed to look like your brows, only better. The Built-in brush allows you to easily blend the color for a natural look. Up to 2-day wear. Sleep-proof, waterproof and transfer-proof. Eye Liner Pencil Nothing completes your look like an eyeliner. Smudge out a sultry, smokey eye with a pencil eyeliner, or use liquid eyeliner to create flawless wings in one simple stroke. Want the lowdown on which liner to use? Check out our guide to the best eyeliner for every new-season trend, from gorgeously graphic to bold and colourful. Lash Accelerator Serum/Mascara Supercharge your lashes for longer, fuller and revitalised lashes in just 4 weeks! Our clinically tested, salon-inspired serum is infused with a nutrient-rich complex of vitamin, proteins and peptides to revitalise, stimulate natural lash growth and protect against breakage and lash fallout. Your lashes have never felt and looked so incredible!

Brow This Way Sculpting Kit Fits Your Bag Brow This Way Sculpting Kit Sculpt the perfect photo-ready, high impact brow. Rimmel's Brow This Way Sculpting Kit lets you shape & fill brows in 2 easy steps using wax and powder, for perfect brows every time. PERFECT EYEBROWS Use Rimmel Brow This Way lightweight brow gel in clear as part of your daily beauty routine to help you achieve eyebrows with that perfect, professionally styled look you want. LIGHTWEIGHT EYEBROW GEL Use Rimmel Brow This Way lightweight brow gel to help you achieve a perfectly sculpted and defined beauty look. SCULPT & DEFINE BROWS Sculpt the perfect photo-ready, high impact brow. TRUE TO YOU What started with the first non-toxic mascara has lead to more than a century of legacy, leadership and innovation in affordable makeup, beauty products, and tools.

Rimmel Magnif'eyes Eyeshadow Palette Get ready to create endless eye-looks. Rimmel London's Magnif’Eyes Eye Contouring Palette offers a vast spectrum from nude to bold eyeshadow shades for all skin tones.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Rommel Make-up Remover
reviews.reviewText: 2 large bottles! Fantastic price, leakproof. Gilds on easily, not greasy. Takes make-up off rather quickly and little pressure. Cotton ball, wipes or make-up removal pads. Quickly and thoroughly. Does not make skin feel greasy after wiping it off. Very little fragrance, pleasant. A-1 for performance. ✅‼️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is one of the best makeup removers I've tried through the years! Removes makeup in one swipe, gentle on skin and so easy to use!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is an affordable makeup remover with no added oils! I’m hooked!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My go to
reviews.reviewText: Love this eye makeup remover. It’s the only one I use but can’t find it in stores anymore. I have super sensitive skin and this stuff removes makeup without irritating or upsetting my skin or my eyes. And it doesn’t have a greasy, oily residue like a lot of the other removers out there.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars IT BURNS! Not gentle! DO NOT PURCHASE!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This is supposed to be their GENTLE eye makeup remover. I have been using the product for years and loved it. I put a small amount of the tip if a cotton swab and wipe away the mascara left under my eyes after the shower. It was affordable, effective, light weight, fast-drying, and never burned my skin. The old bottle had 4.2 oz and the new one has 3.4 but whatever, it was repackaged and I loved the product, right? WRONG! The first time I tried this new formula, it BURNED unbelievably as soon as I applied and and left the same burning sensation for at least 5 minutes after use. I immediately looked at the ingredients and was horrified to find CITRIC ACID as the FOURTH ingredient in this new formula. What the ACTUAL hell is wrong with Rimmel?! Why would a GENTLE formula use citric acid at all? Let alone as one of the top ingredients! So misleading, bizarre, and infuriating! I tried to return it but it had already been past the 30 days. I was finishing up my original bottle and now I have TWO bottles of this TRASH! So pissed!! This is going in the garbage. I would give it away but who would use this? What a waste! How does it have so many stars?!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Can’t find anywhere else

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Does not remove waterproof mascara at all. Wasted money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this stuff!
reviews.reviewText: I love it even over the expensive department store removers. I’m bummed whenever it’s out of stock at stores. Works great when I get out of the shower looking like Alice Cooper. Repeat buyer!
My go to brand, even works somewhat well on waterproof makeup just let it soak for half a minute. Bottle size is now smaller than when this product first came out but still good value.
The most effective eye make up remover which is gentle to your eyes. I wear lenses and Rimmels eye make up remover is non greasy and gentle for my eyes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 12, 2016
reviews.reviewText: Perfect. Fast and gentle, all in one bottle!
This is the best one I have found. It doesn't burn my eyes. This is my go to remover for over 5 years
This product is terrible! Barely removes eye makeup. Lots of rubbing and lots of product required which burns eyes and breaks eyelashes. Usually Rimmel has decent products, this is not one.
